name: CarrierInTheAir
0:
”Alexa, turn on the Bedroom.”
”Alexa, turn off the Bedroom.”
”Alexa, set the Bedroom to Cool mode.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Please follow below step to use Carrier In The Air Smart Home Skill for Amazon Alexa.

Step1: Register your account on Carrier In The Air mobile application.
Step2: Add devices (AC) to Carrier In The Air mobile application follow as application instruction.
Step3: Link your Carrier In The Air account with Amazon Alexa.
Step4: You can control Carrier AC with below example command.

Alexa, turn on the [Bed room].
Alexa, turn off the [Bed room].

Alexa, set the [Bed room] to Cool mode. 
Alexa, set the [Bed room] to Heat mode.
Alexa, set the [Bed room] to Auto mode.

Alexa, set the [Bed room] temperature to 22 degrees. 
Alexa, increase the [Bed room] temperature by 1 degrees.
Alexa, decrease the [Bed room] temperature by 2 degrees.

Alexa, set the [Bed room] fan speed to Low.
Alexa, set the [Bed room] fan speed to Low plus.
Alexa, set the [Bed room] fan speed to Medium.
Alexa, set the [Bed room] fan speed to Medium plus.
Alexa, set the [Bed room] fan speed to High.
Alexa, set the [Bed room] fan speed to Quiet.

Alexa, set the [Bed room] fan speed to 1 (Low).
Alexa, set the [Bed room] fan speed to 2 (Low plus).
Alexa, set the [Bed room] fan speed to 3 (Medium).
Alexa, set the [Bed room] fan speed to 4 (Medium plus).
Alexa, set the [Bed room] fan speed to 5 (High).
Alexa, set the [Bed room] fan speed to 6 (Auto).
Alexa, set the [Bed room] fan speed to 7 (Quiet).

Alexa, what is the [Bed room] set to ?
Alexa, what is the temperature in the [Bed room] ?
